EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for downloading Hybrid Cloud Demands Consistency
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading Forrester's Opportunity Snapshot: Hybrid Cloud Demands Consistency <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/hybrid-cloud-demands-consistency-forrester]]>.
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its cloud-native journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>. Thank you, The Pivotal Team
